title: Post a question or comment on a listing
description: Adds a question (or a comment) to a listing. The seller will be notified.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to add the comment to.

fields.name: FirearmsLicence
fields.description: The user's firearms licence number. This is required for firearms purchases.

fields.name: FirearmsLicenceHolder
fields.description: The user Enters First, Middle, and Last Names associated to the firearms licence.

fields.name: FirstName
FirstName
fields.description: First name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: MiddleNames
fields.description: Middle Names of Licence Holder. Optional;

fields.name: LastName
fields.description: Last name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: IsBuyerOlderThan18
fields.description: The user agrees they are older than 18. This is required for wine purchases.

returns.description: <Question> A ListingQuestion that contains the added comment.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing this question belongs to.

fields.name: CommentDate
fields.description: The date and time the question was asked.

fields.name: Answer
fields.description: The answer given to the question by the owner of the listing.

fields.name: AnswerDate
fields.description: The date the question was answered.

fields.name: IsSellerComment
fields.description: Indicates whether this is a comment from the seller rather than a question.

fields.name: AskingMember
fields.description: The member details for the member asking the question.

nested_fields.description: The ID of the member. This may be0, if we determine it is necessary to protect the member's privacy.
The nickname of the member. Some characters may be changed, if we determine it is necessary to protect the member's privacy.
The date the member was address verified.
The number of distinct members who have placed negative feedback against this member.
The number of distinct members who have placed positive feedback against this member.
The member's total feedback (UniquePositive minus UniqueNegative).
Indicates whether the member has been address verified.
Indicates whether the member is a car dealer.
Indicates whether the member is authenticated.
The profile photo URL of the member
